page.title: 18TRAFFIC
page.content: centre and the industrial estate on the{B1277}road brings many goods vehicles. Traffic counts were carried out along several of the main roads in the area and the results showed that the two busiest were Catcote Road and Stockton Road (the{A689}). On Catcote Road the traffic was mainly cars,{266 in half an hour, while on Stockton Road there was a higher proportion of goods vehicles. The reason for this difference is that Stockton Road serves the industrial estate and the shops of the town centre, while Catcote Road is used as a through - route to the northern part of the town. Local roads, around the estates had much less traffic, except for Truro Drive, which is a link road between Catcote Road and Stockton Road.
